record.title: MEASURE READ THE FIRST TIME--S. 2734
record.narrative:
MEASURE READ THE FIRST TIME--S. 2734 -- (Senate - March 07, 2008)

[Page: S1781]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I understand there is a bill at the desk, and I ask for its first reading.

record.chair: The clerk will report the bill by title.
The assistant legislative clerk read as follows:
A bill (S. 2734) to aid families and neighborhoods facing home foreclosure and address the subprime mortgage crisis.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I now ask for a second reading, and I object to my own request.

record.chair: Objection is heard. The bill will receive its second reading on the next legislative day.
